alert.note: Alert for Owyhee (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 09 at 12:21PM MDT until June 11 at 5:34AM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM MDT/230 PM PDT/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Dry washes and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Near the Jordan Valley Oregon area. * WHEN...Until 330 PM MDT /230 PM PDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1219 PM MDT /1119 AM PDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause dry washes and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Jordan Creek, Cow Creek, West Cow Creek, Big Boulder Creek, Mahogany Creek, O`Keefe Creek, Succor Creek and Posey Creek. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
